title: Comfortable Studio with Balcony Available Today!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Colonnade Apartments!', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', '$2,158 - $2,645', '.', 'Studio 1 Bath .', '400 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 606A - Available 08/20/22', '* Unit 709A - Available 08/30/22', 'The Colonnade Apartments', 'Address:', '201 S 4th Street San Jose, CA 95112', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Live comfortably in this studio model at The Colonnade Apartments!', 'This contemporary floor plan features nine-foot ceilings with vertical blinds on the windows.', 'In the kitchen, a stainless steel appliance suite complements the smooth quartz countertops.', 'Brushed nickel hardware accentuates the kitchen cabinetry.', 'Along with air conditioning and a ceiling fan, this model has in-wall USB ports, double-pane windows, and multi-panel doors.', 'The apartment even comes outfitted with a deck, giving you a great spot to hang out.', 'Take in the community from there, or head out to explore the amenities.', 'Hang out in the clubhouse, swim in the pool, or take a relaxing dip in the spa.', 'The community also has a prime location close to parks, shopping, and much more.', 'Call the leasing office today to discover more!', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
